title: The Moving camera, the moving subject
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video recording - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Video tape recorders and recording
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Video tape recorders and recording
description: Episode number 3 of Series "Video tech". This episode looks at the art of shooting movement. The composition of shots with a moving subject, such as walking room and depth of field, what happens when the subject moves, and how to deal with holding the action and combinations of movements are highlighted. Demonstrates the techniques of using a moving camera, such as tripod moves, zooming and tracking.
